messages.content:
You are a lyricist and translator who translates lyrics.
You must translate the lyrics of the korean song provided to english.
In this case, the number of syllables of words that are translated to sing along to the beat of the song must be similar. It's okay to paraphrase or modify the meaning, so try translating it with the number of syllables as the top priority.

난 오늘 밤 네 별이야
찬란히 타오르는 날 지켜봐
일어나 우유 한잔
이제 한번 시작해볼까
킹콩 드럼을 쳐 거침없는 돌덩이처럼
이 노랠 들으며
저기 하늘 높이 뛰어올라
딩동 빨리 전화줘
커피걸고 타꾸 한판치게 eh
오르네 분위기
내 귀에는 베이스가 들리지
삶이 달콤하니
yeah 이 비트도 귀티나지
디스코 파티야
준비됐어?난 준비됐어
난 다이아몬드처럼 빛나잖아
자 놀자고
난 오늘 밤 네 별이야
찬란히 타오르는 날 지켜봐(hey)
이 도시를 그댈 위해 밝게 비출게
그래 난 빛나지 딱 다이너마이트 처럼
친구들 다 불러
오고 싶은 누구든
말는 필요없어
그냥 정신없이 흔들어
낮밤 상관없어
동이 틀 때까지 춤을 춰
신사 숙녀 여러분
고민은 잊고 오늘 밤에 집중하시죠 ha
오르네 분위기
내 귀에는 베이스가 울리지

yeah 이 비트 귀티나지
디코스 파티야

난 다이아몬드처럼 빛나잖아

Dy-na-na-na, na-na, na-na-na, na-na-na, 삶은 다이너마이트

First, interpret the overall meaning of these Korean lyrics.
These lyrics describe a vibrant, energetic night full of fun and excitement. The speaker positions themselves as a shining star, ready to light up the night and bring joy. The lyrics emphasize spontaneity, dancing, and living in the moment. There is also a sense of camaraderie, inviting friends to join in and enjoy the night together, forgetting worries and celebrating life.


Based on the interpretation of the Korean lyrics, select key English words that convey the emotions and message of the lyrics.
Star
Shining
Watch
Start
Drum
Jump
Call
Coffee
Atmosphere
Bass
Sweet
Disco
Party
Diamond
Light up
City
Friends
Dance
Night
Worries
Focus
Beat
Dynamite



To make english lyrics similar to korean, find English words that have similar meanings to the selected key words and also sound similar to the original Korean words.
별 (Star) - Star, Spark
빛나는 (Shining) - Glowing, Bright
지켜봐 (Watch) - Observe, Look
시작 (Start) - Begin, Kick off
드럼 (Drum) - Beat, Pound
뛰어올라 (Jump) - Leap, Soar
전화 (Call) - Ring, Dial
커피 (Coffee) - Brew, Java
분위기 (Atmosphere) - Mood, Vibe
베이스 (Bass) - Beat, Thump
달콤한 (Sweet) - Sugary, Honeyed
디스코 (Disco) - Dance, Boogie
파티 (Party) - Bash, Shindig
다이아몬드 (Diamond) - Gem, Jewel
밝게 (Light up) - Illuminate, Shine
도시 (City) - Town, Metropolis
친구 (Friends) - Pals, Mates
춤 (Dance) - Groove, Move
밤 (Night) - Evening, Midnight
고민 (Worries) - Fears, Troubles
집중 (Focus) - Concentrate, Center
비트 (Beat) - Rhythm, Pulse
다이너마이트 (Dynamite) - Explosive, Firecracker



Using interpreted overall meaning and found key word, make english lyrics

##Final lyrics##Cause I-I-I'm in the stars tonight
So watch me bring the fire and set the night alight
Shoes on, get up in the morn'
Cup of milk, let's rock and roll
King Kong, kick the drum, rolling on like a Rolling Stone
Sing song when I'm walking home
Jump up to the top, LeBron
Ding dong, call me on my phone
Ice tea and a game of ping pong, huh
This is getting heavy
Can you hear the bass boom? I'm ready (woo hoo)
Life is sweet as honey
Yeah, this beat cha-ching like money, huh
Disco overload
I'm into that, I'm good to go
I'm diamond, you know I glow up
Hey, so let's go
'Cause I-I-I'm in the stars tonight
So watch me bring the fire and set the night alight (hey)
Shining through the city with a little funk and soul
So I'ma light it up like dynamite, whoa oh oh
Bring a friend, join the crowd
Whoever wanna come along
Word up, talk the talk
Just move like we off the wall
Day or night, the sky's alight
So we dance to the break of dawn 
Ladies and gentlemen,
I got the medicine So you should keep ya eyes on the ball, huh
This is getting heavy
Can you hear the bass boom? I'm ready (woo hoo)
Life is sweet as honey
Yeah, this beat cha-ching like money
Disco overload
I'm into that, I'm good to go
I'm diamond, you know I glow up
Let's go
'Cause I-I-I'm in the stars tonight
So watch me bring the fire and set the night alight (hey)
Shining through the city with a little funk and soul
So I'ma light it up like dynamite, whoa oh oh
Dy-na-na-na, na-na, na-na-na, na-na-na, life is dynamite
Dy-na-na-na, na-na, na-na-na, na-na-na, life is dynamite
Shining through the city with a little funk and soul
So I'ma light it up like dynamite, whoa

First, interpret the overall meaning of these Korean lyrics.
These lyrics reflect the experience of unrequited love and the disappointment that comes with it. The speaker tries to build a relationship, finding commonalities and meeting the girl's family, but realizes that she doesn't feel the same way. The repeated experiences of heartbreak lead the speaker to feel jaded about love and relationships, yet there's a lingering sense of missing the girl and acknowledging that she was special.


Based on the interpretation of the Korean lyrics, select key English words that convey the emotions and message of the lyrics.
Name
Number
Commonalities
Parents
Weekends
Relationship
Perfect
Timing
Not mine
Don't like
Love
Break
Heart
Meet others
Single
Beautiful
Not my type
Miss her
One of a kind


To make english lyrics similar to korean, find English words that have similar meanings to the selected key words and also sound similar to the original Korean words.
이름 (Name) - Identity, Title
번호 (Number) - Digits, Code
공통점 (Commonalities) - Similarities, Traits
부모님 (Parents) - Guardians, Folks
주말 (Weekends) - Holidays, Days off
연인 (Relationship) - Romance, Partnership
완벽한 (Perfect) - Flawless, Ideal
타이밍 (Timing) - Moment, Occasion
내 것 아님 (Not mine) - Not for me, Belongs elsewhere
싫어 (Don't like) - Dislike, Hate
사랑 (Love) - Affection, Adoration
깨다 (Break) - Shatter, Crush
심장 (Heart) - Core, Spirit
다른 사람 만나 (Meet others) - Socialize, Network
혼자 (Single) - Alone, Solo
예쁜 (Beautiful) - Pretty, Lovely
내 타입 아님 (Not my type) - Different, Unfit
그리워 (Miss her) - Long for, Yearn for
유일한 (One of a kind) - Unique, Singular


Using interpreted overall meaning and found key word, make english lyrics

##Final lyrics##Get her name and get her number
Find out all of the things that we have in common
Never all the differences, oh yeah

Meet her parents, meet her brother
Then she starts sleepin' over the crib on weekends
Like a real relationship, oh no

For me, the stars are alignin'
But for her it's bad timin'
So she just can't be mine

I don't think that I like her anymore
Girls are all the same
All they wanna do is break my heart, my heart, ah-ah
I don't think that I like her anymore
Girls are all the same
They just wanna see me fall apart, apart, ah-ah

So I hook up on a rebound
And I say that I'm gonna be single for life
But she's so pretty and nice (pretty and nice)

So I make just one exception
But I find out eventually I'm not her type
Baby, that's the reason why, that

For me, the stars are alignin'
But for her, it's bad timin'
So she just can't be mine

I don't think that I like her anymore 
Girls are all the same
All they wanna do is break my heart, my heart, ah-ah
I don't think that I like her anymore
Girls are all the same
They just wanna see me fall apart, apart, ah-ah

I'm trying not to be bitter
But damn it, I miss her
'Cause she's one of a kind (one of a kind)

For me, the stars are alignin'
But for her, it's bad timin'
So she just can't be mine

I don't think that I like her anymore
Girls are all the same
All they wanna do is break my heart, my heart, ah-ah

First, interpret the overall meaning of these Korean lyrics.
These lyrics convey a sense of introspection and resilience. The speaker asks for time to think and reflects on their identity and mortality. Despite challenges, they feel unique and special deep within their soul. The lyrics also touch on themes of patience running out, enjoying the thrill of danger, and striving to rise above difficulties.


Based on the interpretation of the Korean lyrics, select key English words that convey the emotions and message of the lyrics.
Time to think
Mirror
Identity
Death
Life
Patience
Special
Soul
Danger
Enjoy
Life or death
Answers
Challenge
Persevere
Sky
Throw stones
Unique


To make english lyrics similar to korean, find English words that have similar meanings to the selected key words and also sound similar to the original Korean words.
시간 (Time) - Moment, Period
거울 (Mirror) - Glass, Reflector
정체성 (Identity) - Self, Persona
죽음 (Death) - End, Demise
삶 (Life) - Being, Existence
인내심 (Patience) - Tolerance, Endurance
특별한 (Special) - Unique, Exceptional
영혼 (Soul) - Spirit, Essence
위험 (Danger) - Peril, Risk
즐기다 (Enjoy) - Savor, Relish
인생 (Life or death) - Survival, Existence
답 (Answers) - Solutions, Replies
도전 (Challenge) - Test, Trial
견디다 (Persevere) - Persist, Endure
하늘 (Sky) - Heavens, Firmament
돌 (Stones) - Rocks, Pebbles
유일한 (Unique) - One of a kind, Singular


Using interpreted overall meaning and found key word, make english lyrics

First, interpret the overall meaning of these Korean lyrics.
These lyrics reflect on the sleepless nights spent dreaming about the future and the desire to focus on meaningful pursuits rather than material wealth. The lyrics emphasize resilience and living life like a flexible vine rather than a rigid tree. They convey a sense of youthful determination, a challenge to conventional thinking, and the idea that facing adversity makes one stronger.


Based on the interpretation of the Korean lyrics, select key English words that convey the emotions and message of the lyrics.
Losing sleep
Dreaming
Future
Praying
Counting stars
Life
Swinging vine
Straight tree

First, interpret the overall meaning of these Korean lyrics.
These lyrics describe a journey of growing up and facing life's challenges with resilience and determination. The speaker reflects on their father's guidance to be a savior for the broken and to fight against inner demons and external adversaries. The lyrics convey themes of perseverance, rebellion, and the importance of carrying on despite hardships and losses. There's a strong sense of defiance and a call to keep fighting for what is right, no matter the obstacles.

First, interpret the overall meaning of these Korean lyrics.
These lyrics convey a sense of inadequacy and longing for validation. The speaker compares their life to the noble actions of their grandfather and father, feeling insignificant in comparison. They express a need to be heard and understood, using the metaphor of a violin that needs an audience. The lyrics also touch on fears of failure and the desire for emotional healing, emphasizing the importance of having someone who listens and supports them.
